customTypes.name: Tokenised
customTypes.description: For example : Tokenized version of assets. Collect 5000 tokens to redeem for a full ship

customTypes.name: Fleet
customTypes.description: For example : Supply assets for a fleet and keep track with it through representation token

customTypes.name: Collateral
customTypes.description: For example : Deposit dGuild tokens and use assets, return assets safe and take back your deposit
